Class Bookshelf

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Bookshelf
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Bookshelf extends Object implements Serializable
class that define the bookshelf as a matrix of Tile

    • insertTile

      public void insertTile(List<Tile> tiles, int column)
      insert the selected tile into the bookshelf
      Parameters:
      tiles - list of Tile selected by the player
      column - chosen by the player

    • adjacentCells

      public int adjacentCells()
      check the score relative to adjacent cells
      Returns:
      the total score gained by the player from adjacent cells

    • sameGroup

      public int sameGroup(int i, int j, int counter)
      recursive function that find group of same adjacent cells
      Parameters:
      i - index of row
      j - index of column
      counter - variable to count the number of cells in the same group
      Returns:
      the number of cells in the same group

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      check if the bookshelf is full
      Returns:
      true if there isn't any NULL cell

    • isInsertableTile

      public boolean isInsertableTile(List<Tile> tiles, int column)
      check if the selected tiles are insertable in the selected column
      Parameters:
      tiles - to be inserted
      column - where to insert the selected tiles
      Returns:
      true if the tiles are insertable in the desired column, false otherwise

    • maxTilesBookshelf

      public int maxTilesBookshelf()
      this method is used to return the number of empty space max in the same column
      Returns:
      int to represent the number of empty space max in the same column
